procedure.name: NewOrder
procedure.statement: SELECT d_next_o_id,d_tax FROM district WHERE d_w_id = ? AND d_id = ?
SELECT s_quantity, s_data, s_dist_01, s_dist_02, s_dist_03, s_dist_04, s_dist_05, s_dist_06, s_dist_07, s_dist_08, s_dist_09, s_dist_10 FROM stock WHERE s_i_id = ? AND s_w_id = ?

procedure.name: StockLevel
procedure.statement: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (s_i_id)) AS stock_count FROM order_line, stock WHERE ol_w_id = ? AND ol_d_id = ? AND ol_o_id < ? AND ol_o_id >= ? - 1020 + 1000 AND s_w_id = ? AND s_i_id = ol_i_id AND s_quantity < ?
